category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_Saw1DefaultTimeSpanUnit
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default suffix values to be used for the Schedule Task property 'Work Effort' when the property value does not contain any suffix. The preference value represents the unit of the timestamp. Valid values are 'd', 'h', 'w' and 'mo' (days, hours, weeks and months).
